alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 26 at 6:02PM MDT until May 26 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Billings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Big Horn County in south central Montana... North central Sheridan County in north central Wyoming... * Until 645 PM MDT. * At 600 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located near Ranchester, or 15 miles northwest of Sheridan, and just north of Sheridan moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 555 PM, half dollar size hail was reported in Ranchester, and dollar size hail in Dayton. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ranchester, Tongue River Reservoir, Parkman and Rosebud Battlefield Park. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
